timeline.message: Add support for Integer types in pinot

timeline.author: martint
martint
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,30 @@

+package io.prestosql.pinot.decoders;
+
+import io.prestosql.spi.block.BlockBuilder;
+
+import java.util.function.Supplier;
+
+import static java.lang.Float.floatToIntBits;
+
+public class RealDecoder
+        implements Decoder
+{
+    @Override
+    public void decode(Supplier<Object> getter, BlockBuilder output)
+    {
+        output.writeInt(floatToIntBits(((Number) getter.get()).floatValue())).closeEntry();

timeline.message: Add support for Integer types in pinot
Add support for Integer types in pinot
